code: import{createStore,applyMiddleware,compose}from'redux';import reducer from'./reducers/index';import createSagaMiddleware from'redux-saga';import usersSaga from"./action/index";import Redux from"redux-thunk";export function configureStore(initialState){var middleware=[sagaMiddleware];var sagaMiddleware=createSagaMiddleware();var composeEnhancer=window.__REDUX_DEVTOOLS_EXTENSION_COMPOSE__||compose;var store=createStore(reducer,initialState,composeEnhancer(applyMiddleware.apply(void 0,middleware.concat([Redux]))));sagaMiddleware.run(usersSaga);return store;}export default store;
